items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t know why Mary wanted him to leave.

I\'m having a problem deleting one of my files.
I\'m interested in many things, not just music.
This drought has been going on for a long time.
Tom and Mary both feel the same way about that.
Tom and Mary have been having marital problems.
Tom was reading a book the last time I saw him.
Tom was really careful not to spill the coffee.
Tom was staring out the window deep in thought.
